QUEST.helpText: You should try the chef's special creation today!

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: In the middle of lunch, your wrist device beeps.
“5 MINUTES TO GET TO CLASS: SOURCE EFFICIENCY 101”
You nearly spit out your food.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: What?! Since when did I have a class like this?

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: Your wrist device beeps again. “YOUR CLASSES MAY BE RESHUFFLED DURING THE FIRST FEW WEEKS OF SCHOOL”

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: No one told me about this!

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: You gather up your things and get moving to the specified classroom.
You walk in sheepishly, knowing you are already late.
The other students are already seated at the tables. You pick an empty one and sit down.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: I see some of our students aren't as... efficient as this class expects them to be.
Never mind. Let's begin then, before we waste anymore time.

SEQUENCE.NARRATION: A document appears on the monitor before you.
It looks like... a multiple-choice test, with some short-answer questions.
It’s something you’ve only heard of in history books.

DIALOGUE.SPEECH: You have the rest of this class to complete this test. Now begin!
